== Arakapady (627947) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Arakapady is a village in the [[Kunnathunad]] taluka of [[Ernakulam]] district with an area of 1758 hectares and harbouring 4213 households with total population of 17779 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Perumbavoor]] is at a distance of 7 km. Male population is 8920 and female population is 8859. Scheduled Caste Population is 2032 and Scheduled Tribes population is 141. Census Location Code of the village is 627947<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
